# Read in Data from Mazu

```{r}
# load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(janitor)


source(here("workflow/R/common.R"))
```

```{r}
un_job_data <- file.path(dir_M, "git-annex/globalprep/_raw_data/UNWTO/d2023/unwto-employment-data.xlsx")

un_jobs_data_raw <- read_xlsx(un_job_data, col_names = TRUE) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(-c(1:3)) %>%
  fill(1, .direction = "down") %>%
  select(-c(x5, x7:x10))



```
